description: You are a product manager with n versions [1, 2, ..., n]. You want to find the first bad version that causes all subsequent versions to be bad. You have access to an API isBadVersion(version) which returns whether a version is bad. Minimize the number of API calls.

examples.explanation: isBadVersion(3) returns false, isBadVersion(5) returns true, isBadVersion(4) returns true. First bad version is 4.
